Title: Trylon and Perisphere
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Nazanin Boniadi, Laila Robins
Plot: Carrie returns home to the states for an inquiry; Quinn spins out of control; a disgraced former case officer discloses information of great interest.
